text: China Unicom APP user privacy policy
1. The scope and focus explanation of privacy policies
The first release date: 2011 [4] month [6] Day
The release date of this update: 2022 [2] month [26] Day
label: Policy Change

text: Effective date of this version: 2022 [2] month [26] Day
China Unicom (hereinafter referred to as "we") attaches great importance to the protection of users' privacy and personal information, and is committed to maintaining your trust in us.
We promise to take corresponding security measures to protect your personal information.

Please carefully read and understand the "China Unicom APP user privacy policy such as" our products or services ") before using the mobile business, broadband business, fixed -line business, and integration business (hereinafter collectively referred to as" our products or services ")."(Hereinafter referred to as" privacy policy "), especially the thick part of the font.
If you sign or click to confirm the privacy policy, it means that you have understood and agree with the entire content of the privacy policy.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: If you sign or click to confirm the privacy policy, it means that you understand and agree to the entire content of the privacy policy.

text: If you have any questions about the content of this privacy policy, do not perform the next step, and contact us with contact information provided by this privacy policy.

When you use our products or services, we will handle the relevant requirements of national laws and regulations and regulatory policies such as the Personal Information Protection Law such as the People's Republic of China.Personal information.
label: Data Security

text: We hope to explain to you through this privacy policy: When you use our products or services, what information will we collect information, why this information is collected, what this information does, and how we protect this information.
This "Privacy Policy" is the general privacy clause we use uniformly, suitable for all our products and services.

If a certain product or service we provides a separate privacy policy or a special agreement in the corresponding user service agreement, the privacy policy of the product or service will be preferred.
The content that this product or service privacy policy or user service agreement is not covered is based on the content of this privacy policy.
This privacy policy includes the following:
How do we collect and use your personal information;
How do we use cookies and similar technologies;
How do we share, transfer, and publicly disclose your personal information;
How do we protect your personal information;
How can we protect the personal information of minors;
How can your personal information be stored and transferred globally;
How to update this privacy policy;
Your rights;
How to contact us.
2. How do we collect and use your personal information

Personal information refers to the various information related to the recognized or recognizable natural person recorded in electronics or other methods, excluding information after anonymous processing.

We will follow the principles of legitimate, legal, and necessary. For the following purposes described in this privacy policy, collect and use personal information that you take the initiative to provide or use or/or services in the process of using products and/or services in the process of using products and/or servicesAnd get your personal information from a third party.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Data Security
Usage
rewrite: Following the principles of legitimate, legal, and necessary, for the purpose of this privacy policy, collect and use the information generated during the process of using the product or service and obtain your relevant personal information from a third party.

text: If we want to use your personal information for other purposes that have not been stated in this privacy policy, or use the information collected based on specific purposes for other purposes, we will inform you in a reasonable way, and again before useGet your consent.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Data Security
Usage
rewrite: If your personal information exceeds the purpose of this policy or agreed, it will be told you again and obtain your consent again.

text: (1) Based on basic functions you need to authorize us to collect and use your personal information
Our products or services include some basic functions, which are necessary for implementing products or services.
We collect, save, and use the following information to achieve the above functions.
label: Usage
First Party Collection Information

text: In other words, if you do not provide relevant information, you will not be able to enjoy the products or services we provide.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: Specifically include:
1. Personal information you use when you log in to China Unicom APP

When using China Unicom's mobile phone number, broadband account number, fixed -line account number (referred to as "Unicom users"), this APP will use the name of the online mobile phone number, broadband account, fixed -line account nameInformation, package usage, package cost consumption and other information shows the display of information;
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: When Unicom users use this APP, this APP will conduct information such as the name of the access to the net, the information of the access person, the use of package use, and the consumption of package costs.

text: Due to the names of those who logged in mobile phone numbers, broadband accounts, fixed -line accounts, the names of the net, and the information on the Internet, you have been provided in accordance with the real -name system when applying for China Unicom's mobile phone number, broadband, and fixed -line products. ThereforeFill in again;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you apply for mobile phone numbers, broadband, and fixed -line products in China, you have no need to fill in the information provided by the real -name system as required by the real -name system.

text: If you need to change information from the Internet, please go to China Unicom's physical business hall to handle it.
label: Important
rewrite: Please go to China Unicom's physical business hall for change.

text: 2. Personal information you use when using network transaction services

When you use this APP for the network transaction services provided by you, buy a product (non -number card package, broadband network product) or participating in marketing activities to get a winning product that needs to be used in marketing activities.You need to get your consignee's name, the consignee contact phone number, and the consignee address information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When using network transaction services, if you involve logistics delivery, this APP needs to obtain your consignee's name, the consignee contact phone number, and the consignee address information.

text: 3. Personal information you use when you go through the connection procedures of Unicom business in the APP

According to the "Regulations on the Regulations on the Registration of True Information Registration of Telephone Users" (Regulations on the Registration of True Information of Telephone users "(Ministry of Industry and Information Technology No. 25), you can apply for card activation, broadband new installation appointment, government and enterprise online, broadbandIn the area, Wo Xiao, and network access procedures, we must provide us with valid documents and provide real identity information;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: You must provide valid document information and real identity information when you apply for card activation, broadband new installation appointment, government -enterprise online, broadband zone, Wo small number and network access procedures.

text: At the same time, in order to verify the accuracy and integrity of this type of information, we will verify and verify the information that you provide with the information that you provide with your information (government agencies, institutions, and commercial institutions).Get your image information to retain your personal information to identify your identity and go through the network access procedures on the APP.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Verify the information you provided with your information with your information, and obtain your image information to retain your personal information to verify your identity and go through the network access procedures.

text: In your process of applying for the above -mentioned Unicom business, we will collect your following information:, personal user name, business license, album information, regional, valid communication contact information, valid certificate type and number, certificate registration information, read mobile phone status statusObtained image information obtained with identity, photo or online video, business information, distribution address, installation address and location information of your processing.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect your personal user name, business license, album information, regional, valid communication contact information, valid documents and numbers, certificates registration information, read mobile phone status and identity, image information, business information, distribution, distribution, distribution, distribution, distribution, distributionAddress, installation address and location information.

text: If you refuse to provide personal valid documents and real information, you will not be able to go through the network access procedures, and we will not be able to use our products or services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse to provide personal valid documents and real information, you will not be able to go through the network access procedures.

text: 4. Personal information you use when you pay and query the balance

In order to pay directly in the APP and query the remaining calls, traffic and text messages in your package, we will collect your order information, service detailed forms (including calling fees, point -to -point SMS, and point -to -point MMS fees, value -added, value -added,Business fees for details, online traffic expenses for mobile phone online, wireless Internet card traffic expenses, broadband Internet internet details, WLAN traffic expenses, query records, online records, online shopping records), and communication records, consumption information, bill information, bill information, bill information, bill information, bill information, bill information, bill information, Call records, address book, and terminal information to ensure that you can use our services normally, and to achieve your accurate billing charges and accurate balance display.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect your order information, service details, and communication records, consumption information, bill information, call records, address book, terminal information to ensure that you use services and provide you with accurate display of charges and margins.

text: 5. Personal information you use when you apply for business and query business in the APP

In order to make you more conveniently use the basic service in the APP or query the basic services, specifically to query my basic information, package changes, I have ordered, local integration acceptance, different land integration acceptance, and value -added business withdrawal, we will collect yourOrder package information, APP itself screenshot information, album information, certificate registration information, invoice head, value -added business information, to ensure that you can use the above services in the APP without business processing conditions.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect your ordering package information, APP itself screenshot information, album information, document registration information, invoice heading, value -added business information, to provide basic services for processing or inquiry.

text: 6. Personal property information you used when enjoying equity services or participating in activities

In order to facilitate your inquiry about the equity information obtained in the APP, we will collect points, call vouchers, traffic packages, electronic coupons, vouchers, voice packages, card vouchers, and other physical categories you get during the process of enjoying equity services or participating in the activity.Prize information and show you on the corresponding event page.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect your points, phone bills, traffic packages, electronic coupons, exchange coupons, vocal packages, card vouchers, and other physical prizes to show you.

3. How do we use cookies and similar technologies

text: See AboutCookies.org for details.
You can clear all the cookies saved on the computer, and most of the network browsers have the function of preventing cookies.

text: But if you do this, you need to change the user settings when you visit our website.
(2) Website beacon and pixel label
In addition to Cookie, we may also use other similar technologies such as website beacons and pixel labels on the website.
For example, the email we send to you may contain a link to the URL of the content of the content of our website.
If you click the link, we will track this click to help us understand your product or service preferences and improve customer service.
label: Important

text: 7. How can your personal information be stored and transferred globally

Important

text: 8. How to update this policy

Based on providing you with better services and changes in the development of telecommunications business or laws and regulations and regulatory policies, we may update this privacy policy in a timely manner.
